transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan ji ma'am bataiye aap bataiye.
Customer: Haan, toh mere ko yeh puchna tha ki jaise abhi hamara subscription plan chal raha hai. I think agli June tak hamara subscription hai annual. But kya hai ki hume hamara itna dealing nahi hai ab.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: IndiaMART pe hamara itna dealing nahi hoga. Toh hum apna account rakh sakte hai na IndiaMART pe se agar hum free wala bhi chalte hai toh hum rakh sakte hai na. Just in case main nahi chahti ki
Executive: Yeh kehna chah rahi hai ki matlab aage aap services renewal nahi karayengi. Lekin as a free listed aap IndiaMART par apna catalog rakhna chahti hai, right?
Customer: Haan, main rakhna isliye chahti hu kyunki main nahi chahti ki ek aur account ban jaye mere firm ke naam se. Toh us safer side main rakhna chahti hu.
Executive: Accha, but jaise aap bol rahe ho ki business nahi mila hai mujhe aap isliye sirf nahi rakhna renewal karana chahti hai, right? Toh iska yeh reason bhi ho sakta hai na ki
Customer: Haan. Accha. Matlab main yeh puchna chah rahi thi ki iska ek reason toh yeh bhi ho sakta hai na ki aapka account aapke haath mein tha hi nahi, aapka koi aur use kar raha tha. Toh kahin na kahin humne business liya hoga, right? Aapko nahi mil paya hoga. But abhi hamare paas chance hai.
Executive: Nahi business milne dene ki baat nahi hai. Hum karna chahe toh hum kar sakte hai. This is that hamara humne something this was something experimental for us. Toh humne first time kiya tha. Hamara main kaam jo hai woh thoda different hai.
Customer: Accha.
Executive: Hum government companies mein deal karte hai. Toh hamara main kaam wahi hai.
Customer: Accha.
Executive: Toh abhi hum sure nahi hai abhi hum iske saath continue karna chahte hai ya nahi chahte. Bas hum apna account rakhna chahte hai free wala because abhi hum isko actively use nahi kar rahe.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Bas itna hi tha mujhe puchna tha.
Executive: Haan, koi dikkat nahi hai woh toh matlab rahega. Dekhiye IndiaMART ka jo directory page hai na, toh IndiaMART ke directory page se aapki listing gir jayegi. Matlab listing down ho jayegi. Obviously woh waha se download kar dega aapki company kyunki obviously directory page par wahi catalogs dikhte hai jo register hote hai, right?
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Toh woh haan aur matlab top par agar visibility ki agar main baat karu toh top par visibility aapki nahi rahegi kyunki free listed company toh aapki rahegi IndiaMART pe. Lekin agar aap chahenge ki jaise aap package mein amount deke aur aap apni services mein apne catalog ko top par dikhati hai aapke local mein woh possible ho jaye toh woh nahi hoga. Kahin na kahin aap sabse niche dekhengi matlab jaha pe dekhengi aap waha pe jaha par already matlab free listed wale catalogs honge aur uske upar services jinka paid rahega un sabse pehle toh unka hi dikhega. Toh rahega IndiaMART pe aapka free listing, koi issue nahi hai.
Customer: Theek hai fir woh listing haan mujhe woh tha toh us case mein bhi koi aur toh nahi bana payega na same GST se?
Executive: Nahi nahi. Nahi nahi nahi nahi.
Customer: Theek hai. Aisa kuch issue nahi hoga, haan. Baki aap mujhe yeh bataiye matlab unke paas aapke documents matlab kaise chale gaye hai ma'am?
Executive: Nahi hum chale nahi gaye hum sure nahi hai but hum nahi chahte agar aisi koi situation arise ho jaye toh hume pata hona chahiye ki kya karna hai us case mein.
Customer: Accha.
Executive: Nahi nahi waisa kuch bhi nahi hota hai. Aisa kuch bhi nahi hota hai toh aap befikar rahiye nahi ho payega. Theek hai baki toh main bolungi ki ab toh aapke hand mein aa gaya hai catalog aap thoda sa jo bhi aapka do-teen mahine services bacha hua hai, do-char mahine aap us pe thoda sa highly active hoke kaam karke dekhiye. At least jo aapka investment hai woh toh nikal jaye at least, right? Kyunki abhi tak koi aur haan kyunki abhi tak koi aur use kar raha tha toh waha pe kya tha ki waha pe possibility hai hi nahi ki hum le payenge waha pe. But ab hamare hand mein hai toh hamare paas chances hai ki hum usko easily use kar sakte hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Of course, of course. Woh main dekhti hu. Haan. Baki baki koi agar dikkat hota hai services se related jaise aapko agar guidance ki zarurat hai services mein for an example ki kaise karna hai video meet par aap samajhna chahti hai ya fir on call discussion karna chahti hai toh woh bhi main ek baar manage karke aapko
Customer: Haan main aap se puch lungi. Haan ji.
Executive: Haan haan aapko. Ek aur cheez mujhe puchni thi jaise ab yeh misuse waghaira kiya gaya hai hamare documents ka ya account ka yeh jo itne time thoda hum misuse hua hai by the employee.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Should I also like mail so that the platform gets to know that this has happened just for you know future purposes ki record mein aa jaye ki aisa hua tha because I think thoda legally angle se dekhe agar by chance unhone misuse kiya hai kuch gadbad ki hai toh platform ko bhi pata ho hume bhi pata ho toh should I mail the platform just in case aage koi dikkat na aaye?
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi woh mail karengi aap wapas se toh fir wapas se concern woh open ho jata hai, right? Toh isse related already aapne jo concern open kiya hua hai na woh hamare track mein matlab hamara usme aa jata hai track mein aa jata hai ki haan hamari jitni bhi matlab aapki company hai company agar koi bhi kholega toh waha pe woh sari cheeze na mention rehti hai ki kab aapke saath kya discussion hua tha kab aapke saath kya issues hue the toh woh obviously waha pe na check kar sakte hai.
Customer: Jaise yeh toh update wala issue hai yeh toh change aur woh wala issue hai. Main yeh keh rahi hu ki jaise unhone dawaiya bechi hai, theek hai? Ab agar unhone bina bill ke for example dawai bech di ya kuch gadbad ho gayi toh ab platform mein dikkat na aayega matlab question kiya jayega hum bhi question kiye jayenge. Toh mujhe bas ek informatory mail dalni hai ki yeh yeh hamare haath mein nahi tha account is time period se is time period tak but ab hamare account mein hai. Hamare hold mein hai yeh account. Toh main us purposes se keh rahi hu main koi concern nahi raise karna chahti bas main inform karna chahti hu.
Executive: Nahi isliye wahi cheez main bata rahi hu lekin yaha pe pata hai kya hoga ya hamare yaha IndiaMART par kya hota hai agar aap chota sa bhi koi cheez waha par mention karti hai na toh hamari team ko lagta hai jo hamari team hai ki aapka koi issue hai woh resolve karana hai toh woh ek concern bana ke na woh ek open kar deti hai. Fir waha pe aapke account manager ko connect karna hota hai jo bhi aapka account dekhna hota hai toh woh agar aap company ko mail karengi ki aisa issue hua hai and all karke toh fir woh ek concern bana ke open kar degi. Main ek baar discuss kar leti hu ki haan yeh record mein rahe ki aisa kuch hua hai aur fir aage se aisa kuch issue na ho ya fir agar aisa kuch woh karti bhi hai abhi bhi toh aap se koi discussion na ho, right? Kyunki aapko pata hai ki yaha pe aapke cheeze hai.
Customer: Kyunki issue yeh hai ki aage kuch issue raise hota hai jisme hum question kiye jaye ki aapka naam use hua hai aur aapke naam pe unhone is time period mein dawaiya bechi gayi hai aur IndiaMART pe bechi gayi hai toh mujhe hai ki you know koi hona chahiye record mein hona chahiye ki haan humne inform kiya tha IndiaMART ko ki hum aware hai aur hum ab is pe kaam kar rahe hai. Toh I get it aap customer care wala woh baat karengi woh concern raise karengi toh agar koi for example legal department hai ya kuch aur department jisko mail kar sakte hai aap pata karke bata dijiye.
Executive: Ek bari ji ji bilkul ek baar main discuss kar leti hu ki iska koi kya solution hai kyunki iska dekhiye abhi tak aisa kuch mere paas abhi aisa koi feedback aaya nahi hai jo aap mujhe bata rahe the ki dekho issues hote hai aur aisa aata bhi hai companies pe ki log unke product khud bechte hai fir unke naam pe bechte hai toh waha pe hamari buyer supplier ki conflict team na ek alag hoti hai, theek hai? Ki waha par agar koi issue hota hai toh hamari proper ek buyer supplier ki conflict team hai jo buyer se bhi baat karti hai aur supplier se bhi baat karti hai aap logo ka issue samjhegi fir woh resolve kara ke aapko degi. Toh isme hamara beech mein aisa kuch hai hi nahi ki hum isko resolve kara ke de, right? Woh hamare hand mein hai hi nahi. Toh mere ko ek baar pehle discuss karna padega ki haan agar karana bhi hua aisa aisa kuch toh kise karna padega ki kyunki buyer supplier ki jo conflict
Customer: Hmm. Haan mere ko na actually kisi ne bola tha kyunki hum bhi thoda concerned the because hamara naam use hua hai na hamare naam pe dawaiya bechi gayi hai.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: Ab agar unhone by chance kuch ghapla kiya hai toh question mein hum hi aayenge seedha, theek hai? Later IndiaMART ko evidence ke liye they might contact aur toh IndiaMART ka kuch purpose nahi evidence ke liye aapko bula sakte hai but hume hume hume question kiya jayega. Toh mujhe apni safety ke liye puchna tha ki jaise mujhe kisi lawyer ne hi bataya tha ki aap IndiaMART ko mail kar sakte hai apne record ke liye ki aapne yeh yeh aapne dekha aapne observe kiya toh aapne action liya us pe bas mujhe itna sa karna hai toh aap please baat karke agar aap pata kar sakte hai.
Executive: Haan done done done main baat karke na aapko evening tak update kar paungi, theek hai? Main discuss kar lungi fir main aapko update kar dungi. Jo bhi rahega jaisa bhi rahega woh main aapko update kar dungi.
Customer: Haan ji theek hai ma'am. Thank you so much. Thank you. Thank you so much ma'am. Thank you.
Executive: Haan Kunal tum kya keh rahe the?
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to keep the IndiaMART account active.

- Concerned about misuse of documents/account by ex-employee.

- Wants to inform IndiaMART about the misuse.

- Concerned about legal implications of unauthorized sales.



Resolution:

- Executive explained directory page listing will be lower.

- Executive assured no one can create account with same GST.

- Executive will discuss the misuse issue internally.

- Executive will update the customer by evening.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will update the customer by evening.



Alert (If Any):

- misuse



@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, account, misuse, legal, documents
